name: Super Dice Country
description:
Super Dice Country

The Windows Build is recommended.

When you one day wake up as a sentient die you really have to take a roll of the dice to figure out what is going on.

It seems almost like someone has set this world up just to mess with you. The only way to find out how and why this happen seems to be following the path before you.

Explore the 4 levels and let us know what you think.

Controls:
Movement - WASD or Left Thumb Stick
Menu - Esc (or Enter) or Start Button
